  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User()
      Model class for representing a user profile and event associations. Encapsulates basic profile information and tracks events that a user has been waitlisted for or accepted into. Provides safe getters and utility methods for list management.

  • Method Details

    • getWaitlistedEventIds

      public List<String> getWaitlistedEventIds()
      Returns the list of event IDs where the user is currently waitlisted. If the internal list is null, returns an empty list.
      Returns:
      A non-null list of event IDs where the user is waitlisted

    • getAcceptedEventIds

      public List<String> getAcceptedEventIds()
      Returns the list of event IDs where the user has been accepted. If the internal list is null, returns an empty list.
      Returns:
      A non-null list of event IDs where the user has been accepted

    • addToWaitlist

      public void addToWaitlist(String eventId)
      Adds an event to the user's waitlist if it's not already present. Initializes the waitlist if it doesn't exist.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique identifier of the event to add to waitlist

    • removeFromWaitlist

      public void removeFromWaitlist(String eventId)
      Removes an event from the user's waitlist. Does nothing if the waitlist is null or the event is not in the list.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique identifier of the event to remove from waitlist

    • addToAcceptedEvents

      public void addToAcceptedEvents(String eventId)
      Adds an event to the user's accepted list and removes it from the waitlist. Initializes the accepted list if it doesn't exist. Only adds the event if it's not already in the accepted list.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique identifier of the event to mark as accepted

    • removeFromAcceptedEvents

      public void removeFromAcceptedEvents(String eventId)
      Removes an event from the user's accepted list. Does nothing if the accepted list is null or the event is not in the list.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique identifier of the event to remove from accepted list

    • getUserId

      public String getUserId()
      Returns the user's unique identifier.
      Returns:
      The user's ID in the system

    • getFullName

      public String getFullName()
      Returns the user's full name.
      Returns:
      The user's complete name

    • getAge

      public Long getAge()
      Returns the user's age.
      Returns:
      The user's age as a Long value, may be null if not set

    • getEmail

      public String getEmail()
      Returns the user's email address.
      Returns:
      The user's email address as a string

    • getPhone

      public String getPhone()
      Returns the user's phone number.
      Returns:
      The user's phone number as a string

    • getAccountType

      public String getAccountType()
      Returns the user's account type (e.g., attendee, organizer, admin).
      Returns:
      The user's account type as a string

    • setFullName

      public void setFullName(String fullName)
      Sets the user's full name.
      Parameters:
      fullName - The new full name for the user

    • setAge

      public void setAge(Long age)
      Sets the user's age.
      Parameters:
      age - The user's age as a Long value

    • setEmail

      public void setEmail(String email)
      Sets the user's email address.
      Parameters:
      email - The new email address for the user

    • setPhone

      public void setPhone(String phone)
      Sets the user's phone number.
      Parameters:
      phone - The new phone number for the user

    • setAccountType

      public void setAccountType(String accountType)
      Sets the user's account type (e.g., "attendee", "organizer").
      Parameters:
      accountType - The account type label to assign to the user
